title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, model 2554A. This sleek, black, multi-functional cleaning powerhouse is perfect for busy households looking for an efficient and effective way to keep their floors spotless.

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max boasts a rotating brush system that ensures a thorough clean, with a wide 10.5-inch cleaning path that covers more area in less time. The swivel head and carry handle make maneuvering around furniture and tight spaces a breeze, while the cordless design and powerful 36V Lithium-Ion battery provide up to 30 minutes of uninterrupted cleaning time.

This versatile cleaner is compatible with a variety of surfaces, including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs. Its improved edge cleaning capabilities ensure no spot is left untouched, and its self-cleaning cycle makes maintenance a breeze.

The CrossWave Cordless Max features two-tank technology, with a clean water tank capacity of 28 oz and a dirt tank capacity of 18.6 oz, keeping clean and dirty water separate for optimal performance. The device is also WiFi-connected, allowing you to control it remotely through the BISSELL Connect app.

Included with your purchase are 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls. Plus, with every purchase, you're supporting the BISSELL Pet Foundation, helping to save homeless pets.

Experience the convenience and power of the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop today!
